policy_title: Privacy Policy (PDPA) and Data Disclosure Terms
policy_readHint: Please read thoroughly. Scroll to the bottom to enable acceptance.
policy_s1_p1: This document sets out how we collect, use, disclose, and protect personal data under Thailand's PDPA and our internal practices. ‘Personal data’ means any information relating to an identifiable person, directly or indirectly.
policy_s2_l1: To deliver requested services and improve user experience
policy_s2_l2: To verify identity and ensure system security
policy_s2_l3: To comply with laws, regulations, and audits
policy_s3_p1: We rely on appropriate legal bases such as contract performance, legitimate interests, and/or your consent where required. If you withdraw consent, processing prior to withdrawal remains lawful.
policy_s4_p1: We retain data only as necessary for stated purposes and legal requirements. When no longer needed, data will be deleted or anonymized.
policy_s5_p1: We may share data with processors, partners, or government authorities as required by law with appropriate security safeguards.
policy_s6_l1: Right to access and obtain a copy
policy_s6_l3: Right to erasure or restriction in certain cases
policy_s6_l4: Right to object to certain processing
policy_s7_p1: We may use cookies/trackers to enhance services. You can configure your browser to reject cookies, which may affect some features.
policy_sPublic_p1: You acknowledge and consent that, to the extent permitted by law, information you provide may be displayed on our website as public information for transparency and service purposes.
policy_s8_p1: You agree that all disputes related to this document and/or the services are subject exclusively to the jurisdiction of the
policy_s8_venue: courts located in New York, NY, USA.
policy_s9_p1: If you have questions about personal data, please contact our DPO/controller via the channels listed on our main website.
policy_acceptLine: I have read and accept the PDPA policy, data disclosure terms including public disclosure, and the jurisdiction clause above.
